copyright:
AIO-switch-updater is licensed under GPL-3.0
© 2020 HamletDuFromage
Disclaimers:
  Aside from cheat codes that are mirrored from the main Gbatemp thread, HamletDuFromage isn't hosting anything. All credits go to respective owners.
  Links are refreshed every 30 minutes. If a link remains broken after 30 minutes have passed, please open a Github issue.
donate:   Like the app? Consider donating to support my efforts: 'https://git.io/donate_homlet'
app_label: The following titles have received cheat code updates the last time you used the app. Please note that despite having been downloaded for a game, cheats may not match its current update.
v1_0_1_text:
  Added dialogue box asking about ini files.
  Fixed update app link when not connected to the internet.
  Minor fixes here and there.
v1_0_2_text:   Fixed .ini files being handled poorly when installing sigpatches. Now prompts the user if they want to replace hetake_ipl.ini.
v1_0_3_text:   Fixed progress bar sometimes being stuck when extracting.
v1_1_0_text:
  Added an option to download payloads to '/bootloader/payloads'.
  Cleaned up some stuff, made .ini overwriting cleaner.
v1_1_1_text:
  Added some safety checks before downloading/extracting.
  Added the possibility to copy a payload to '/atmosphere/reboot_payload.bin'
  Added changelog in 'Tools'
v1_1_2_text:   Added GUI to disable cheat updates for specific titles.
v1_1_3_text:
  Now displays the latest installed cheat version.
  Now warns in the app title if a new update is available.
v1_2_0_text:
  Now multilingual (thanks to 'github.com/tiansongyu').
  Chinese and French are currently supported.
v1_2_1_text:   Added option to set a payload to /bootloader/update.bin
v1_3_0_text:   Added back the ability to update CFWs
v1_3_1_text:   Small fixes for bugs causing hangs.
v1_3_2_text:
  Added ability to change the internet color of Pro Controllers.
 Added the ability to preserve specific files when updating.
 Added the ability to clean up downloaded archives.
v1_4_0_text:
  Added possibility to use pre-set network settings. Add your own in `config/aio-switch-updater/internet.json.
 Added web browser.
v1_4_1_text:   Fixed misleading display in internet settings page.
v1_4_3_text:  Fixed switch not rebooting to hekate payload after updating.
v1_5_2_text:  Added support for Traditional Chinese (thanks to 'https://github.com/qazrfv1234')
v2_0_0_text:
 Added ability to download cheatslips cheats.
 Added way to toggle out tabs.
 Various code improvements.
v2_0_1_text:  Fixed a bug not letting the user click no when asked if they want to install hekate.n Correct a bunch of typos.
v2_1_0_text:  Switched to a better way to get links.
v2_1_1_text:
 Added a friendly reminder to reboot for new sigpatches to apply.
 Changed the cheatslips cheatsheet view.
v2_2_0_text:  For cheatslips.com, the build ID of a running game will now be fetched, allowing you to access cheatsheets even if the build ID isn't listed in the versions database.
v2_2_1_text:  Fixed non Atmosphere CFW being wrongly categorised as ams.
cheat_exclude: Exclude games from recieving cheat updates
please_reboot: The changes will take effect at the next reboot.
cheatslips_label:   Log into CheatSlips.com and download cheat sheets for your games.
download_cheatslips:
Download a selection of cheat sheets from CheatSlips.com.
Those cheat codes will be added to the end of your existing cheat file.
couldnt_dl_cheats: Could not fetch selected cheat codes/invalid token.
quota_cheatslips:
Quota exceeded for today!
Head on to 'https://www.cheatslips.com/subscriptions' to see how to increase it.
app_cheatslips_label: Select a game to download cheats for.
wrong_cheatslips_id: Couldn't retrieve token, make sure you enter you login properly
bid_not_found: Couldn't obtain build ID. Try launching aio-switch-updater in applet mode while the game is running.
select: Select a payload to download to '
description:
Could not find a download link, make sure the Switch has access to the internet.
If this problem persists, please open an issue on Github.
reset_machine: Language has changed. Please reboot the app for the change to take effect
you_can: You can turn off cheat updates with this menu
jc_you_can_1:
You can change the internal color of your Joy-Cons. Make sure they're docked.
Color profiles are stored in '
jc_you_can_2: to generate your own custom profiles.
jc_backing: Backing up the current color profile. Make sure the Joy-Con are docked. If the process hangs, try docking/undocking the JCs.
jc_change: Changing color. Make sure the Joy-Con are docked. If the process hangs, try docking/undocking the JCs.
jc_all_: All done! You may need to dock/undock your Joy-Cons for the change to take effect.
pc_you_can: You can change the internal color of your Pro Controller. Make sure it's set to Player 1.
pc_all_done: All done! You may need to turn your controller on and off for the change to take effect
firmware_text:
  Firmware dumps from 'https://darthsternie.net/switch-firmwares/'. Once downloaded, it will be extracted in '/firmware'. You can then install the update through Daybreak or ChoiDuJour.
  Current FW:
currentCeatsver:
  This will download a daily updated archive of cheat codes from 'gbatemp.net'. Cheat codes for games you don't have installed won't be extracted to your SD card. You can turn off cheat updated in 'Tools->Cheat menu'.
  Current cheats version:
list_sigpatches:   Sigpatches allow your Switch to install and run unofficial NSP file. Make sure you pick the correct sigpatches for your setup (pure Atmosphère or Hekate+Atmosphère). Reboot the console to apply patches.
list_ams:
  From this menu, you can download and update the Atmosphère custom firmware necessary to run homebrew software.
  DeepSea by Team Neptune is a CFW pack that includes Atmosphère, hekate, and various homebrew apps.
list_could_done:
Could not find a download link, make sure the Switch has access to the internet.
If this problem persists, please open an issue on Github.
payload_select: Select a payload to reboot to.
hide_tabs_label: Hide tabs from the main menu
utils_because: Because of the size of the FW archive, downloading firmwares in Applet Mode is not supported. Please launch the app with full RAM access.
utils_do: Do you want to overwrite existing
utils_the: The downloaded file is not a sigpatches archive. This is most likely due to a broken link. If the problem persists after more than 30 minutes, please open an issue on Github.
utils_the_downloaded: The downloaded file is not a firmware archive. This is most likely due to a broken link. If the problem persists after more than 30 minutes, please open an issue on Github.
ultils_overwrite: Do you want to overwrite existing .ini config files?
ultis_file: The downloaded file is not a CFW archive. This is most likely due to a broken link. If the problem persists after more than 30 minutes, please open an issue on Github.
reboot_rcm: The Switch will now reboot to a special payload in order to finalise the install.
hekate_dialogue:
Do you want to also download Hekate?
If not, the Switch will now launch reboot to a special payload in order to finalise the install.
files_not_found: The following files were not found and couldn't be copied:
